title: The Return of ‘Better Call Saul’ and the Season Finales of ‘Severance’ and ‘The Dropout’
description:
Chris is joined by Sean Fennessey to talk about the poor box office numbers for Michael Bay’s ‘Ambulance’ and what it means for action movies (1:03). Then they talk about the imminent return of ‘Better Call Saul’ after a two-year hiatus (11:08), the ‘Severance’ season finale and what it means for Season 2 (18:43), and the season finale of ‘The Dropout’ (37:01).

Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Sean Fennessey
Producer: Kaya McMullen
